venues.name: The Spa at Torrey Pines
venues.review: Set on the cliffs above the Torrey Pines golf course with views of the Pacific that you'd pay just to sit and look at. The spa experience matches the setting — the outdoor eucalyptus steam garden alone is worth the drive from downtown. One of the best resort spas on the West Coast.

venues.name: Kure Spa
venues.review: San Diego's most polished urban wellness studio, with infrared saunas, cold plunge, and recovery treatments designed for the active person. Two downtown locations. The contrast therapy sessions are well-programmed.
